attributes.action: To allow psv Licence holders to upgrade free to a class 2 lorry licence.
attributes.additional_details: As a psv driver, you are driving vehicles that are longer than a class 2 lorry. And busses can weigh a lot more than a lorry as well. With a bus you are carrying precious cargo (passengers) so why can you not allow a psv licence holder to be allowed an automatic right to a class 2 licence.
attributes.background: Allow bus drivers to upgrade to a class 2 licence
